body.name: Dash Camera for Cars,4K Full UHD Car Camera Front Rear with Free 32GB SD Card,Dashcams for Cars with Night Vision,24 Hours Parking Mode,WDR,G-Sensor,Motion Detection
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 27 mins
features: 【Dash Camera for Cars】3 channel camera can record video up to Full UHD 4K( 3840*2160P) on the front and 1080P on the rear, Offering a 170° front camera, a 120° built-in camera and a 150° rear camera, it can simultaneously monitor the front, rear and interior of the vehicle to maximize road coverage, greatly enhance night vision and provide clear and crisp images and videos. The dashcam is a combination of front, rear and interior cameras..

【Dash Cam Front and Rear】The dashcam with super night vision and infrared cabin light uses f/2.0 wide aperture with a total of 6 layers of optical lens and WDR technology, coupled with 4 infrared lights, enabling the car camera to show good color accuracy and clearly capture important details day or night.

【Dash Camera】To achieve 24-hour parking continuous recording function, you need to buy a hardware kit to start (note: this product does not include a hardware kit, you need to buy it separately) When your car turns off, the dashcam will automatically switch to the parking mode. Collision detection can be triggered by impact or collision, and delayed recording maintains low power consumption and low frame rate continuous recording,protecting vehicle from theft or vandalism.

【Car Camera - Dash Cam Front and Rear】Comes with a free U3 32GB Micro-SD memory card .When the storage capacity on the memory card reaches its limit, the newly recorded recording will automatically overwrite the old recording. Triggered by the g sensor, it can automatically detect sudden vibrations/collisions and lock the lens to prevent video from being overwritten, even during loop recording.

【Car Dash Cam】When the storage limit on the memory card is reached, the latest record will automatically overwrite the old record. Automatically detects sudden shocks/collisions and locks emergency footage to prevent video from being overwritten during loop recording. Thanks to the heat-resistant chipset and adhesive pad, the car dashcam can be well attached to the windshield at extreme hot or cold operating temperatures from -40 ° F to 185 ° F.

【Car Camera】We have a complete pre-sales and after-sales team, you can contact our team if you have any questions about this car camera, and we will answer any questions/concerns you have. We provide 7*24 hours technical support..

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 24 Hours Recording & Parking Monitor Parking surveillance mode is when the car recorder detects a collision, it will automatically power on and record protected video. If you need the car recorder to record continuously for 24 hours after parking, you need to use the voltage drop cable to energize the car recorder and the car recorder parking surveillance turns on into normal recording state. (This feature requires the use of a hardwire kit) Super Night Vision & WDR Thanks to advanced sensors, the F2.0 aperture and Wide Dynamic Range makes night shots brighter and prevents overexposure. Eliminating the need for an auxiliary light source even in low-light environments, Can obtain color-accurate images with ease and all the details. Rear Camera Waterproof The rear camera supports mounting on the rear window or above the number plate. The rear camera is water resistant, so you don't have to worry about the rear camera mounted on the license plate being damaged by rain.

Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside 170° wide Angle lens (front) covers 3 lanes and records front details. 120° wide Angle to record the interior dynamics and 150° wide Angle to capture the rear of the vehicle. Eliminates your blind spots and provides greater security. Strong protection of your travel or daily commute. Dash Cam Loop Recording In loop recording, the camera will record the video in 1/3/5 minute segments. When the Micro SD card is full, the loop recording automatically overwrites the earliest files. (Locked videos will not be overwritten). G-Sensor The Prilotte car dash cam with built-in adjustable G-Sensor, 6 layers of advanced lenses help record better video. it's quickly captures an emergency and automatically locks the footage, save recordings into the emergency folder to prevent that video from overwritten.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very worth it。
reviews.reviewText: This camera is clear and it is easy to use once you get to know what each button does. I sat down and read the book that came with it way before using it so that I could get a good understanding of everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I have wanted a car dash cam ever since my daughter was involved in a hit and run accident. This camera records day and night with good quality. It works in sync with the start of your vehicle and It's easy to install and operate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great camera gives a better picture than my other dash cam which was more expensive. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product provides better protection for my safety
reviews.reviewText: After receiving it today, I installed it as soon as possible. Although the process took a while, the result is very good. Both the clarity and operation are very simple. There are many modes.. The picture quality is clear and visible. I like this very much. product
